Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $150. This special offer is exclusive to you and is subject to immediate acceptance. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the superior quality and functionality firsthand. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
